tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE credit_card_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    card_holder_name TEXT,
    card_number TEXT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE anomalies (
 anomaly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 transaction_id INT,
 anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
 anomaly_detected_at TIMESTAMP
 FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE credit_card_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    card_number VARCHAR(16),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    detection_type VARCHAR(20),
    detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customer_profile (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(50),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE credit_card_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID NOT NULL,
    card_number BIGINT NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    merchant_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE cardholders (
    cardholder_id UUID NOT NULL,
    cardholder_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    card_type VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    card_status VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (cardholder_id)
);

CREATE TABLE card_fraud_flags (
    flag_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_id UUID NOT NULL,
    flag_reason VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    flag_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (flag_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES credit_card_transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_audit_logs (
    log_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_id UUID NOT NULL,
    audit_type VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    audit_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (log_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES credit_card_transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_alerts (
    alert_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_id UUID NOT NULL,
    alert_type VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    alert_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (alert_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES credit_card_transactions(transaction_id)
);
